title: December Crash Catches Up to Evenepoel at Liège-Bastogne-Liège: ‘I Cannot Expect Miracles’
content:
Remco Evenepoel fades to 59th at Liège-Bastogne-Liège after under-cooked star becomes undone: 'I haven't trained much, and that showed today.'

Read the full article at December Crash Catches Up to Evenepoel at Liège-Bastogne-Liège: ‘I Cannot Expect Miracles’ on Velo.
author: ahood
